SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="45ce80c3d45c42279a58d86c7dffaf31" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're the one who saved me, yeah?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
HaHA![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Am I ever grateful for you,
my friend![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="45ce80c3d45c42279a58d86c7dffaf31" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I came here to investigate this place from
an archaeological perspective.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="45ce80c3d45c42279a58d86c7dffaf31" Scale="1"/]See,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm trying to reconstruct collapsed
structures and,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] really,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just investigate all
sorts of fascinating stuff.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="45ce80c3d45c42279a58d86c7dffaf31" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I plan to write a paper based on what
I find.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Everyone in my field is gonna DIG it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
HaHA,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just a little archaeology joke there!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="85c7628f1e264854ab6111727649450b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I heard you use raw materials to
make bridges and,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] all sorts of
things.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Did I get that right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="85c7628f1e264854ab6111727649450b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]I did?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's great.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just what I wanted
to hear![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="85c7628f1e264854ab6111727649450b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The thing is,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd love it if you could
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]tell me when you build [System:Color name="Default"]something.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Would you mind?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="85c7628f1e264854ab6111727649450b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Don't get me wrong,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wouldn't ask you
to do it for free.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] No, no,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll give you
something to show my appreciation.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="e8110e917f1f4cb59ae514b3ff40ad51" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]For starters,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let me know when you build
10 things, OK?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think this is gonna help
a lot of folks,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so thanks for doing this.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="018b8b9a85174f598a2d429cdac33f2b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I tell ya,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] raw materials sure are handy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The way they can be turned into almost
anything...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it's incredible![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="018b8b9a85174f598a2d429cdac33f2b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]My guess is there was someone on this
planet who used raw material to build all
sorts of things.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="11bc2fa31ca1465fa8e1233733e98a5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Raw materials are meant to be used, not
hoarded.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Stuff is just waiting to be
made out of them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know?
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="419da639dbd64d14b5db9417bc46fc81" Scale="0.9840425"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]OK, OK![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Next up,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's see if you can get
20 things built.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All this hard work...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it's
gonna lead to a breakthrough.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm sure of it!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="d1f58bd3df1d4f6fbd6a2b16055035c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When you get inspired,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's like finding a
shortcut.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It helps you take something from
an idea to a reality as quickly as possible.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d1f58bd3df1d4f6fbd6a2b16055035c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]So if you've got inspiration on your
side,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just set aside logic,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] reason,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
validation...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and go with the flow!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="980f720215fc4ed2b7606e6294bed2b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You might end up finding a castaway if
you keep up all the building with these
raw materials.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="980f720215fc4ed2b7606e6294bed2b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]At the very least,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're gonna give me
all sorts of good stuff for my research
paper.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd say that's a win-win all around!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="35aae7a532b64572b7bce9fab8d84e54" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]How about we wrap things up by finishing
43 construction projects?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We do that, and
our names will go down in history![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hope.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="2af28298be214ac18dd921a9a8dcc6f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What kind of beings lived here?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What was
their civilization like?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Was this land always
like this?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's so much I want to know.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2af28298be214ac18dd921a9a8dcc6f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I can't wait to find the answers!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="23192d4234bf4a2e98926186d9e97c4e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Sometimes others ask me why I became
an archaeologist.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23192d4234bf4a2e98926186d9e97c4e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]The answer is real simple.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's because
archeology is FUN![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23192d4234bf4a2e98926186d9e97c4e" Scale="1"/]There's no better kind of life to have
than a fun life,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] ya know?
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="3191f97a2cb14bb487e3e859676f45a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I heard you use raw materials to
make bridges and,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] all sorts of
things.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Did I get that right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3191f97a2cb14bb487e3e859676f45a4" Scale="1"/]I did?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's great.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just what I wanted
to hear![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3191f97a2cb14bb487e3e859676f45a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]The thing is,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd love it if you could
tell me when you build something...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3191f97a2cb14bb487e3e859676f45a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Hold on...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've already built a bunch
of things?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3191f97a2cb14bb487e3e859676f45a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]HaHA![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I should have known it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I knew you
seemed like someone who was gonna get
up to good things.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="f2fdf84b025e47d0a6cf69a7a87e9ef2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'll examine the things you build,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and one
day I'm gonna make a discovery that's
gonna blow this field right out of its boots!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="032d073be5b14c3ba2b1706c1e39b52b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Whoa,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you built all that?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="dfb958d016694892b6ba49c87d306b89" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are you a professional builder?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dfb958d016694892b6ba49c87d306b89" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Well, you are now![etc:Wait frame="8"/] HaHA!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="29935c8fb1644a01a67bfa13a127af6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Thank you so much![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Your work is not just
satisfactory...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it's outstanding!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="c53bbaca5c0d4aa9a796bd1853f7477f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Once I study the structures you've built
or repaired,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sure I'll make a
groundbreaking discovery.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c53bbaca5c0d4aa9a796bd1853f7477f" Scale="1"/]And then I'm gonna put your name in
my paper.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] HaHA,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just you wait!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="24b806b3ff4c40888d873782bae6e977" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]For all the things you built...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you
gotta take this.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I want you to know how
much I appreciate it.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="35dc09d0bb284b5c82fc2e3b04f99488" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Intriguing fact:[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when you use raw material,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
you get MORE raw material.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a true
perpetual-motion building machine!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="3f39366249ac44fc8a4458179cde5608" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]By rebuilding things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] archaeologists are
able to observe,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] study,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and better grasp
how the original builders thought.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3f39366249ac44fc8a4458179cde5608" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It helps us understand the construction
techniques used and the roles these
things played in the builders' civilization.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="17536ca115ec4233a1d90a0fd5f7d1ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You know how some bridges are made from
a combination of raw materials,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] while some
are just a giant plank?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="17536ca115ec4233a1d90a0fd5f7d1ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The methods used to make them are
different,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="17536ca115ec4233a1d90a0fd5f7d1ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It's probably because the structures
were used and then replaced by different
generations who upgraded them over time.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="96522ec517a1450c9b2b54d82ce9246b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ever since coming to this planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the folks
in the task force have been pretty excited,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I get it though.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I GET IT![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="96522ec517a1450c9b2b54d82ce9246b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The more you look around here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more
you find mysteries waiting to be solved.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Talk about a fun planet to investigate!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="7991788c2e514a44b01ed36780d6e3dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I've been watching you really put in the
effort,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and I can't help but think you're
starting to remind me of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf10"/]Kit[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7991788c2e514a44b01ed36780d6e3dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Not just anyone can do what you do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Both you and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf10"/]Kit[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm really impressed
by you two.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="410e215c64764a18954eeabe0a410c85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'd LOVE to go do some investigating
right now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it'd be awful if I got
stranded again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="410e215c64764a18954eeabe0a410c85" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I don't want to cause you any more
trouble,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I'll stick close and check out
the building projects around here.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="48c781dd17b44029b170d602f85dd703" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You can't just keep helping me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's too
one-sided, you know?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You gotta let me
know if there's anything I can do for you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="48c781dd17b44029b170d602f85dd703" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Of course,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] pretty much the only thing I'm
trained to do is archaeology investigation.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
HaHA,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what can I tell ya?
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="6f977bd7a5c14d6496eb109aa836b741" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I tell ya,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] raw materials sure are handy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The way they can be turned into almost
anything...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it's incredible![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6f977bd7a5c14d6496eb109aa836b741" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]My guess is there was someone on this
planet who used raw material to build all
sorts of things.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="0f14f4141c2f409d974270dd0fd53c04" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Grammar:Cap/]raw materials are meant to be used, not
hoarded.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Stuff is just waiting to be
made out of them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know?
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="5dd8a37c67dc42558462ef7c92048dd5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When you get inspired,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's like finding a
shortcut.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It helps you take something from
an idea to a reality as quickly as possible.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5dd8a37c67dc42558462ef7c92048dd5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]So if you've got inspiration on your
side,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just set aside logic,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] reason,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
validation...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and go with the flow!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="d442e4ee95494fc8b39ee98bc846a7aa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What kind of beings lived here?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What was
their civilization like?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Was this land always
like this?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's so much I want to know.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d442e4ee95494fc8b39ee98bc846a7aa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I can't wait to find the answers!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="d7ccc80da1e546599d1fd6b4502e2335" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Sometimes others ask me why I became
an archaeologist.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d7ccc80da1e546599d1fd6b4502e2335" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]The answer is real simple.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's because
archeology is FUN![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d7ccc80da1e546599d1fd6b4502e2335" Scale="1"/]There's no better kind of life to have
than a fun life,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] ya know?
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="057746c9b7af42e9a8fd326a974a5a04" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]By rebuilding things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] archaeologists are
able to observe,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] study,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and better grasp
how the original builders thought.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="057746c9b7af42e9a8fd326a974a5a04" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It helps us understand the construction
techniques used and the roles these
things played in the builders' civilization.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="7e0feda96bfa433e91b4537fcfee907f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You know how some bridges are made from
a combination of raw materials,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] while some
are just a giant plank?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7e0feda96bfa433e91b4537fcfee907f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The methods used to make them are
different,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7e0feda96bfa433e91b4537fcfee907f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It's probably because the structures
were used and then replaced by different
generations who upgraded them over time.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="c1b76698ec5644c2a0e9d061d3e13f8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ever since coming to this planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the folks
in the task force have been pretty excited,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I get it though.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I GET IT![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c1b76698ec5644c2a0e9d061d3e13f8b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The more you look around here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more
you find mysteries waiting to be solved.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Talk about a fun planet to investigate!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="5e59892e75a04174a755b2228b91eb09" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Aren't you a big ol' doggy![etc:Wait frame="8"/] What'd you eat
that turned you into a giant?!
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="a00dab9ee35641ac866524b6d6edbaa5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]What is it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Are you hungry or something?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm sorry,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] buddy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All I've got right now
are yucky raw materials.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a00dab9ee35641ac866524b6d6edbaa5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]They can be used for just about anything,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but they still aren't edible.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Sorry.
SV013.SV013_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="378a4d7fed8e40b998f053a697518538" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Whoa,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for a second there,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I thought I was
looking in a mirror![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I almost went to fix
my hair.
